channel.title: Help please! Login box
channel.description: My login box just sucks can someone please give me a link for a tutorial or something to teach me how to change it please?

item.title: Help please! Login box
item.dc:creator: @Phaze_One Fuscate
item.description:
@Phaze_One wrote:

Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1.java. Find whatever image you had previously in your sprites folder and search for that name in the java file. Replace that with the new image you want. The image must be in .jpg format.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please! Login box
item.dc:creator: @Praktikanten Praktikanten
item.description:
@Praktikanten wrote:

First, check the images in your clients “Sprites” folder. If there is an image for your login box there, then just edit that image. If not however, you will have to edit the cache.

How to edit the cache and change you login box:

  1. Download Tom’s Cache Suite (google it)

  2. Start the Suite.

  3. Press “File” > “Load Cache” in the top left corner.

  4. Locate your clients cache folder and press open.

  5. Press the “View/Edit Image Archives” button.

  6. Select “Title” and press “Ok”.

  7. A new box should open now. Under the list of “Files” click on the one named “Titlebox.dat”. (might be a different name for you)

  8. Press “Import” and choose your own loginbox image.

  9. Press “Save Archive” and close Tom’s Cache Suite (aka, Cache Edtior).

Since we have different clients the name of your files and such might be a bit different, but this is how I edit my loginbox and it might at least give you the general idea.

EDIT: Oh, I forgot this is for a 317. I don’t know if it will be the same for like a 508 or something.

Read full topic
